alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Edgefield; Lexington; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 10:12AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Edgefield, west central Lexington, north central Aiken and southeastern Saluda Counties through 1045 AM EDT... At 1012 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Johnston, or 14 miles west of Batesburg-Leesville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Batesburg-Leesville, Edgefield, Johnston, Ridge Spring, Edgefield County Airport, Monetta, Trenton, Ward, Strom Thurmond High School, Harmony, Hibernia, Kneece and Samaria Fire Station. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 37 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
